level.heading: Conversion of property.
level.text: ยง 26-810 Conversion of property. Notwithstanding the provisions of section 26-805 and section 26-806 of this chapter, when a conversion occurs, an owner or bona fide purchaser shall allow the current tenant or tenants to remain in their respective dwelling units for the longer of six months from the effective date of the conversion or until the tenant's lease expires, and at the same terms and conditions as before such conversion. Such owner or purchaser may, with the agreement of the tenant or tenants, relocate such tenant or tenants to comparable units with comparable rents in accordance with procedures to be established by the rules of the department.
